If a creature's damage resistance is reduced to 0 by the armor damage, then the armor is destroyed unless it is enchanted.

monster.name: Kaiden
actionHeader: Kaiden can make 2 greatsword attacks or two long bow attacks. He has 40 stamina.

action.name: Nodachi
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Unshakeable
entries: Kaiden adds +1 to damage resistance dice for heavy armor and has advantage against being knocked {@condition prone} or staggered while in heavy armor.

trait.name: Unbreakable
entries: Kaiden has a damage threshold of 15, meaning that you need to do 15 damage with bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage to deal any damage to him at all.

trait.name: Tactics Expert
entries: Kaiden is an expert of tactics. He can add +4 to his initiative rolls, and can give allies within 30 feet the help action for attacks as a bonus action. Any ally within 30 feet of him who can see him also adds {@dice 1d4} to attack rolls.

reaction.name: Parry and Riposte
entries: Kaiden can parry and riposte with his nodachi. He can parry attacks as a reaction, costing 2 stamina, adding +4 to his armor class. If an attack misses, he can riposte as a reaction.
If an attack misses when he parries, he can spend 2 stamina and riposte, making the attack with advantage.

entries: When Mjoll makes a power attack against someone with a shield, she can forgo the +10 damage to remove the shield of the enemy. The shield falls to the ground 10 feet away.

trait.name: Tactics Novice
entries: Mjoll can add +3 to her initiative, and grant allies the help action at 30 feet.

monster.name: Inigo

reaction.name: Quick Dodge
entries: Inigo can spend 4 stamina to halve the damage of a weapon attack that he can see which targets him.

reaction.name: Punisher
entries: When an enemy misses with an attack within 5 feet, he can use his reaction to make a shortblade attack, which has advantage and critically hits on a 19 or 20.

actionHeader: Inigo can make 2 weapon attacks as an action, and can make 2 weapon attacks as a bonus action with his offhand weapon. Inigo has 35 stamina.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +10} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Swift Escape
entries: When inigo takes the dash action, he can spend 5 stamina to add +4 to his armor class until the beginning of his next turn.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Inigo can add {@damage 4d6} damage to one weapon attack per turn when he has advantage on an attack or if an ally is within 5 feet of his enemy.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Inigo can take the dash, disengage, or hide action as a bonus action.

monster.name: Auri

trait.name: Dead Shot
entries: Auri adds a +2 to her longbow attacks.

trait.name: Ambush Predator
entries: On the first round of combat, Auri can take an extra attack as part of her attack action.

actionHeader: Auri can make 2 longbow attacks. Auri has 40 stamina.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +14} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Bow Expert
entries: Auri can make a free bonus action attack when using her longbow.

monster.name: The Ebony Warrior

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Slow Time (8 Points)
entries: The Ebony Warrior can command time on its knees and force it to crawl. Until the beginning of his next turn, he can take his turn 3 times. After his next turn time returns to normal.

actionHeader: The ebony warrior can make 4 attacks, and has 200 stamina. He has 10 points that he can use to shout, replacing one attack with a word of a shout, or using his action to say a full shout.

legendary.name: Attack (1 Action)
entries: The ebony warrior makes 1 attack

legendary.name: Move (1 action)
entries: The ebony warrior moves his movement speed

legendary.name: Percieve (1 action)
entries: The ebony warrior makes a perception check.

reaction.name: Parry and Riposte
entries: The ebony warrior can parry as a reaction (2 stamina), adding +6 to his ac until the beginning of his next turn. If an enemy misses, the warrior can hit the enemy as a reaction.
If the enemy misses after the warrior parries, then the warrior can spend 2 stamina as part of the same reaction to make an attack roll with advantage against that enemy.

bonus.name: Adrenaline Rush
entries: Once per long rest, The Ebony Warrior can activate adrenaline as a bonus action. Once activated, for the next minute, gain {@dice 2d10} temporary hit points and stamina, 5 extra movement, and advantage on dexterity saving throws.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Ebony Warrior has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If The Ebony Warrior fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Invincible
entries: With the warrior's armor and skill, they have a damage threshold of 17, meaning a single weapon attack needs to pass 17 damage to do any damage, unless they ignore damage resistance of heavy armor.

monster.name: Rumarin

from: 15 against bludgeoning, slashing, and piercing damage

actionHeader: Rumarin can make two weapon attacks with his conjured sword, and one with his offhand sword as a bonus action, without adding his charisma bonus to the damage.

action.name: Summoned Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 8}) slashing damage, or {@dice 1d6 + 2} if it's his offhand weapon

trait.name: Daedric Armory
entries: When rumarin conjures a weapon, he can use his charisma instead of strength or dexterity for the attack and damage roll, and make two weapon attacks with the attack action while wielding that weapon.

monster.name: Zora Fair-Child

trait.name: Dragonskin
entries: As a Breton, Zora has natural resistance against some spells. She has advantage on intelligence, wisdom, and charisma saving throws.

bonus.name: Dragonskin (1/day)
entries: For 1 minute, Zora has resistance to bludgeoning, slashing, and piercing damage.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Ice Bolt (6 magicka)
entries: {@hit 3} to hit, {@damage 1d10} cold damage, half to stamina.

action.name: Oakflesh (5 maggicka)
entries: {@dice 3d6} DR

actionHeader: Zora can make 2 weapon attacks, or cast a spell. Zora has 30 stamina and 20 magicka.

monster.name: Janesssa

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +8} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

actionHeader: Janessa can make two weapon attacks with her main hand, and 2  attacks as a bonus action with a shortblade

trait.name: Short Blade Master
entries: Janessa can take two attacks as a bonus action for free when using a short blade. She critically hits on a 19 or 20, and critical hits ignore damage resistance from heavy, medium, light, and unarmored defense.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Janessa can add {@dice 3d6} to any attack with advantage once per turn, or if an ally is within 5 feet of an enemy.

reaction.name: Punisher
entries: When a creature misses Janessa within 5 feet she can use her reaction to stab them, attacking with advantage, and critically hitting on a 19 or 20.

monster.name: Belrand

bonus.name: Woad (1/day)
entries: Once a day, Belrand can add his strength modifier to his armor class for 1 minute.

actionHeader: Belrand can make 2 attacks as his action, or cast a spell. Belrand has 25 stamina and 25 magicka.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Oakflesh (5 magicka)
entries: {@dice 3d6} DR against normal weapons

action.name: Conjure Familiar (7 magicka)
entries: Belrand summons a spectral wolf. It has the stats of a wolf.

action.name: Healing Burst (22 magicka)
entries: Heals {@dice 6d8 + 3} hp on touch.

action.name: Lesser Ward (6 magicka)
entries: 1 Minute, {@dice 1d4} to saves, {@dice 2d10} dr against magic damage.

monster.name: Lucien Flavius

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Ice Spike (10 magicka)
entries: {@damage 3d8} Cold damage, {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 feet.

action.name: Oakflesh (5 magicka)
entries: {@dice 3d6} DR against normal weapon damage.

actionHeader: Lucein has 8 stamina and 12 magicka.

bonus.name: Healing Hands (5 Magicka)
entries: Lucien heals one creature within 30 feet for {@dice 1d4 + 3} health.

monster.name: Skjor
actionHeader: Skjor can make 3 attacks with his battleaxe. Skjor has 70 stamina.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Woad (1/day)
entries: Skjor can add his strength to his armor class once a day.

bonus.name: Block (4 stamina)
entries: Skjor can block with his shield, adding {@dice 6d6} to his damage resistance until the start of his next turn. If he blocks on his next turn, he maintains the damage resistance unless it hit 0.

monster.name: Sahloknir

ac.condition: against bludgeoning, slashing, and piercing damage

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee attack, reach 10 ft. {@hit 12} to hit, {@damage 2d6 + 7} piercing damage. Critically hits on a 19 or 20 and critical hits ignore armor.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee attack, reach 10 ft. {@hit 12} to hit, {@damage 2d6 + 7} bludgeoning damage. Ignores heavy and medium armor.

action.name: Claw
entries: Sahloknir can attack and grab with its claws while in the air. It has a {@hit 12} to hit, and deals {@damage 1d12} piercing damage.

action.name: Wing Strike
entries: Targets with a 30 foot radius circle of Sahloknir must make a dex save, {@dc 18} or be knocked {@condition prone}, and take {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Dexterity Save)
entries: Yoor (4 points), 15 foot cone, {@damage 4d10 + 7} fire damage | Tol 30 foot cone {@damage 8d10 + 7} fire damage | Shuul 60 foot cone {@damage 12d10 + 7} fire damage.

action.name: Frost Breath (Constitution Save)
entries: Fo (4 points), 15 foot cone, {@damage 4d10 + 7} cold damage | Krah 30 foot cone {@damage 8d10 + 7} cold damage | Diin 60 foot cone {@damage 12d10 + 7} cold damage.

action.name: Disarm (Dexterity Save).
entries: Zun (3 Points) - Disarm in a 10 foot radius, weapons fly 10 feet | Haal (6 Points) Disarm in a 20 foot radius, weapons fly 20 feet

actionHeader: Sahloknir can make 3 attacks with his bite or tail. He can also replace one of his attacks with a word of a shout.
Sahloknir has 15 points he can spend on shouts. If he runs out of points, he can roll 1d6 at the start of his turn to regenerate that many points. His shout save DC is 20

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Sahloknir fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Sahloknir has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Battlebard (5/day)
entries: Inspire allies in a 60 foot radius sphere, adding {@dice 1d4} to attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Inspirational (5/day)
entries: Grant ally within 60 feet +5 to attack roll, ability check, or saving throw once within the next 10 minutes. Can be used as a reaction as well.

reaction.name: Cutting Words
entries: After someone makes a check, but before you know if it succeeds you can subtract 5 from the roll.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The svaknir can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

monster.name: Khash

ac.condition: (19 against bludgeoning, slashing, and piercing damage)

trait.name: Swift Escape
entries: When Khash moves, they can spend 5 stamina to add +5 to armor class, and if they attack they can move away from their enemy without provoking an attack of opportunity.

trait.name: Short Blade Expert
entries: Khash can make 2 attacks with her short blade as a bonus action. She critically hits on a 19 or 20 with her short blade, and critical hits ignore armor.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: When Khash has an ally within 5 feet of her enemy, or she has advantage on an attack roll, she adds {@damage 5d6} damage to one attack per turn.

reaction.name: Punisher
entries: When an enemy misses with a melee attack within 5 feet, Khash can use her reaction to make a melee weapon attack with advantage.

action.name: Glass Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Iron Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

actionHeader: Khash can make 2 attacks as part of her attack action, and two attacks with a bonus action. She has 40 stamina.

monster.name: Gorr
actionHeader: Gorr can make 2 greatsword attacks. He has 77 stamina.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Parry and riposte
entries: Gorr can parry and riposte as a reaciton. He can spend 2 stamina to add +4 to his armor class until the start of his next turn. If an enemy misses, he can attack as a reaction. If he parries and the enemy misses, he can spend 2 stamina to attack with advantage.

monster.name: Thalmor Spy

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: When the thalmor spy has advantage on an attack or they have an ally within 5 feet, they can add {@damage 5d6} damage of the weapons type to the attack's damage. On a critical hit, this ignore damage resistance granted by armor.

trait.name: Ambush Predator
entries: The spy can make an extra attack on the first round of combat.

action.name: +2 Glass Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +11} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d4 + 7}) piercing damage. The dagger critically hits on a 19 or 20, and if it critically hits, it ignore light, heavy, or medium armor.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +11} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage. This damage ignores damage resistance from light, heavy, or medium armor.

action.name: Invisibility (29 magicka)
entries: For one hour the spy can become {@condition invisible}. Creatures have disadvantage on perception checks trying to locate the spy, and the spy is heavily obscured. The effect ends early if the spy attacks or ends the spell early as a bonus action.

action.name: Muffle (12 magicka)
entries: When the spy casts muffle, their footsteps are silenced for 1 hour, and they advantage on dexterity (stealth) checks that rely on being unheard.

action.name: Sphere of Silence (36 magicka)
entries: In a 20 foot radius sphere, centered on a point within range (60 feet), no sound can occur within the radius.

action.name: Silence (15 magicka)
entries: The spy can attempt to silence one creature within range. Target must make a wisdom saving throw, or be silenced for one minute. DC is 17.

action.name: Frenzy (30 magicka)
entries: The spy can cause a group of creatures to go into a frenzy. The spy chooses a point within 60 feet where all creatures in a 20 foot radius sphere must make a charisma save ({@dc 17}) or become frenzied.
A frenzied creature gains a second attack if they do not already have one, and must attack a creature randomly within their movement speed.

The creature can be determined by a luck check between any possible targets, with the lowest member being targeted by the frenzied creature. A target can make another saving throw at the end of their turn.

reaction.name: Punisher
entries: When an enemy within 5 feet of the spy misses on a melee attack roll, the spy can take an attack of opportunity as a reaction. This attack has advantage, and critically hits on a 19 or 20.

actionHeader: The spy can make 2 attacks with their attack action. They have 56 stamina, and 64 magicka.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The spy can hide, dash, or disengage as a bonus action.

monster.name: Thalmor Spellblade

trait.name: Gold and Glass
entries: The thalmor are high elves, and are powerful in magicka use, but weak against it. The thalmor have disadvantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects, but advantage against saving throws for disease.

trait.name: Evasive Maneuvers
entries: When the spellblade takes a reaction to avoid the damage of a spell, they take no damage on a success, and half damage on a failure.

actionHeader: Spellblades can use conjured weapons, making two attacks with them their conjured saber. They have 40 stamina and magicka.

action.name: Summoned Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) force damage.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (10 Magicka)
entries: 150 foot line, {@damage 8d6} lightning damage, dex save ({@dc 14})

bonus.name: Quick Heal (10 magicka)
entries: {@dice 4d6} heal on touch

bonus.name: Protective Ward (5 magicka)
entries: {@dice 1d4} on saves against magic, {@dice 4d6} DR against magic while the ward is up.

monster.name: Thalmor Wizard

trait.name: Quick Reflexes
entries: The wizard has quick reflexes. They they have advantage on dex saving throws and initiative.

trait.name: Alteration Mage
entries: The thalmor wizard can enhance their flesh spells, gaining {@dice 4d6} extra dr when they cast an alteration spell, and anyone within 10 feet of that spell gains {@dice 2d6} extra (this is included in the spell description). Additionally, the caster and one target they touch gains +2 to armor class, and anyone within 10 feet gains +1 to armor class

action.name: Shock Bolt (4 magicka)
entries: {@hit 9} to hit, {@damage 1d12 + 3} lightning damage, range 90 feet, on deals damage to magicka as well.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (18 Magicka)
entries: 150 feet, dex save or take {@damage 8d6 + 8} lightning damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. DC is 16

action.name: Stoneflesh (10 magicka)
entries: The wizard can touch one creature and grant them stoneflesh, giving {@damage 8d6} damage resistance against bludgeoning, slashing, and piercing.

action.name: Healing Surge (16 magicka)
entries: {@dice 5d8 + 5} Healing on touch

action.name: Raise Wall (4 magicka per round)
entries: Raises a 10 foot by 10 foot wall of stone. Can be maintained as long as {@status concentration} is kept. The wall has 30 hit points and a damage threshold of 15, and an armor class of 15.

actionHeader: The thalmor wizard can shoot 3 shock bolts with his action, or any other spell with one action. He has 100 magicka.

bonus.name: Quick Heal (10 magicka)
entries: {@dice 4d6 + 4} heal on touch

bonus.name: Protective Ward (10 magicka)
entries: {@dice 1d4} against spell saves, and {@dice 5d10 + 10} DR against spell damage.

monster.name: Thalmor Justiciar (Spellblade)

trait.name: Gold and Glass
entries: The thalmor are high elves, and are powerful in magicka use, but weak against it. The thalmor have disadvantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects, but advantage against saving throws for disease.

trait.name: Evasive Maneuvers
entries: When the spellblade takes a reaction to avoid the damage of a spell, they take no damage on a success, and half damage on a failure.

trait.name: Alacrity
entries: The justiciar can add their wisdom to their initiative (total of +7)

trait.name: Fragments of the Future
entries: The justiciar knows fragments of the future. When a creature rolls, the justiciar can change the result of that roll to the pre-rolled result. The justiciar's rolls are a 20 and a 4.

trait.name: Amulet of Magical Resistance
entries: The amulet of magical resistance has 21 charges. With 1 charge, you can grant yourself {@damage 2d6} damage resistance to magical damage, as a bonus action.

With 4 charges you can grant yourself +1 to saving throws against spells and magical effects as a reaction, and with 12 charges you can reroll a saving throw against a spell save or magical effect as a reaction.

actionHeader: Justiciars can use conjured weapons, making three attacks with them their conjured saber. They have 84 stamina and magicka.

action.name: Summoned Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 8}) force damage.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (10 Magicka)
entries: 150 foot line, {@damage 8d6} lightning damage, dex save ({@dc 14}), dealing damage to magicka as well.

action.name: Shock Bolt (5 magicka)
entries: {@hit 9} to hit, 90 foot range, {@damage 1d12 + 2} lightning damage to health and magicka.

bonus.name: Enhanced Quick Heal (20 magicka)
entries: {@dice 8d6} heal on touch

bonus.name: Protective Ward (5 magicka)
entries: {@dice 1d4} on saves against magic, {@dice 8d6} DR against magic while the ward is up.

legendary.name: Attack (1 action)
entries: The thalmor justiciar makes 1 attack

legendary.name: Move (1 action)
entries: The justiciar move up to their movement speed.

legendary.name: Look (1 action)
entries: The justiciar makes a perception check.

legendary.name: Shock Bolt (1 action)
entries: The justiciar makes a shock bolt.

monster.name: Thalmor Justiciar (Wizard)

trait.name: Quick Reflexes
entries: The wizard has quick reflexes. They they have advantage on dex saving throws and initiative.

trait.name: Alteration Mage
entries: The thalmor wizard can enhance their flesh spells, gaining {@dice 4d6} extra dr when they cast an alteration spell, and anyone within 10 feet of that spell gains {@dice 2d6} extra (this is included in the spell description). Additionally, the caster and one target they touch gains +2 to armor class, and anyone within 10 feet gains +1 to armor class

action.name: Shock Bolt (4 magicka)
entries: {@hit 10} to hit, {@damage 1d12 + 4} lightning damage, range 90 feet, on deals damage to magicka as well.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (18 Magicka)
entries: 150 feet, dex save or take {@damage 8d6 + 12} lightning damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. DC is 18

action.name: Stoneflesh (10 magicka)
entries: The wizard can touch one creature and grant them stoneflesh, giving {@damage 8d6+12} damage resistance against bludgeoning, slashing, and piercing.

action.name: Healing Surge (16 magicka)
entries: {@dice 7d8 + 14} Healing on touch

action.name: Raise Wall (4 magicka per round)
entries: Raises a 10 foot by 10 foot wall of stone. Can be maintained as long as {@status concentration} is kept. The wall has 30 hit points and a damage threshold of 15, and an armor class of 15.

actionHeader: The thalmor wizard can shoot 4 shock bolts with his action, or any other spell with one action. He has 120 magicka.

bonus.name: Quick Heal (10 magicka)
entries: {@dice 4d6 + 4} heal on touch

bonus.name: Protective Ward (10 magicka)
entries: {@dice 1d4} against spell saves, and {@dice 10d10 + 20} DR against spell damage.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The scamp can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: The scamp stabs hard with its nasty claws. If the scamp has advantage on an attack, it can deal an extra {@damage 2d6} damage with said attack once per round.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Dwarven Sphere

trait.name: Heavy Armor
entries: The dwarven sphere has a damage threshold of 7, meaning any attack of bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage that deals less than or equal to 7 damage does not deal damage to the sphere.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dwarven sphere has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

actionHeader: The dwarven sphere has 50 stamina.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dwarven sphere can make two blade attacks, or two crossbow shots.

action.name: Arm Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120/300 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) piercing damage. This damage ignores light, medium, or heavy armor damage resistance.

action.name: Lock Blade (5-6)
entries: This dwarven sphere can lock a blade into a target. Target must make a dexterity saving throw ({@dc 17}). If they fail, the target is {@condition restrained} by the dwarven sphere until the start of their next turn.

Targets who are {@condition restrained} in this way must make a choice, to take damage to their armor or to their health, exclusively. If they take damage to their armor, the damage is doubled, or affects their health normally.
The dwarven sphere then makes three attacks at advantage. Each one that hits deals {@dice 2d6 + 6}, or {@dice 4d6 + 6} if it affects their armor.

legendary.name: Attack (1 action)
entries: The dwarven sphere makes 1 attack.

legendary.name: Move (1 action)
entries: The dwarven sphere moves it's movement speed.

legendary.name: Perceive (1 action)
entries: The dwarven sphere makes a wisdom (perception) check.

legendaryHeader: If the dwarven sphere is alone in battle, it will activate it's defense mode, which will grant it legendary actions, of which it has 2.

monster.name: Dwarven Spider

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dwarven spider has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actionHeader: The dwarven spider has 30 stamina.

action.name: Leg Stab
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shock Bolt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/30 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Jumping Leg Pierce {@recharge 5}
entries: The dwarven spider jumps up and locks onto a target, who must make a dexterity saving throw ({@dc 16}), or be {@condition restrained} by the spider. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the spider makes 2 piercing attacks with it's drill.
The target of this attack must decide whether the damage affects their health or armor. If it affects their armor, the damage is doubled.
Each attack has a {@hit 8} to hit, and deals {@damage 1d6 + 6} piercing damage, or {@dice 2d6 + 6} if it affects armor.

monster.name: Dwarven Centurion

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dwarven centurion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actionHeader: The dwarven centurion has 100 stamina.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dwarven centurion can make 3 axeblade attacks, or 2 axeblade attacks and 1 Hammer Slam or AP Blade attack.

action.name: Axeblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d6 + 11}) slashing damage which ignore medium armor and shields, as well as magical damage resistance.

action.name: Hammer Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d6 + 11}) bludgeoning damage. Target must make a dexterity save on a hit ({@dc 21}) or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Armor Piercing Blade {@recharge 5}
entries: Target must make a dexterity save ({@dc 21}, or take {@damage 6d6} piercing damage to their health, or {@damage 12d6} piercing damage to their armor.

action.name: Steam Breath (5-6)
entries: The centurion emits a steam breath from its area resembling a face. Everyone that isn't a construct in a 30 foot cone originating form the centurion must make a constitution saving throw ({@dc 21}), or take {@damage 10d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Steam Bath (5-6)
entries: The centurion lets off some steam, forcing everyong in a 20 foot radius sphere around the centurion to make a con save ({@dc 21}), or take {@dice 8d6} fire damamge on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

legendary.name: Attack (1 action)
entries: The dwarven centurion makes 1 axe blade attack.

legendary.name: Move (1 action)
entries: The centurion moves its movement speed.

legendary.name: Perceive (1 action)
entries: The centurion makes a perception check.

monster.name: Dwarven Ballista

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dwarven ballista has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actionHeader: The dwarven ballista has 40 stamina.

action.name: Ballista {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 300/600 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) piercing damage. This damage ignores armor or deals double damage to the armor of the wearer, depending on what they choose.

monster.name: Falmer

trait.name: Blind
entries: The falmer are blind, but have enhanced hearing. They cannot make sight based wisdom (perception) checks, but have advantage on hearing based wisdom (perception) checks. If a creature has the muffle effect, then they cannot hear a creature moving.

trait.name: Poisoned Blades
entries: Falmer blades are {@condition poisoned}. Once per turn, if you let the poison affect your health, then you must make a constitution saving throw ({@dc 15}), or take {@damage 1d6} poison damage at the start of your turn for one minute, and gain the {@condition poisoned} condition for the duration.
While {@condition poisoned} in this way you have disadvantage on death saving throws. You can make another con save at the end of your turn to end the effect of the poison early.

actionHeader: The falmer has 40 stamina and magicka.

action.name: Multi-Attack
entries: The falmer can make two weapon attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Falmer Skulker

trait.name: Blind
entries: The falmer are blind, but have enhanced hearing. They cannot make sight based wisdom (perception) checks, but have advantage on hearing based wisdom (perception) checks. If a creature has the muffle effect, then they cannot hear a creature moving.

While {@condition poisoned} in this way you have disadvantage on death saving throws. You can make another con save at the end of your turn to end the effect of the poison early.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the falmer skulker deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the falmer skulker that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the falmer skulker doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actionHeader: The falmer has 40 stamina and magicka.

action.name: Multi-Attack
entries: The falmer can make two weapon attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Hide
entries: The falmer skulker can hide as a bonus action.

monster.name: Falmer Warmonger

trait.name: Blind
entries: The falmer are blind, but have enhanced hearing. They cannot make sight based wisdom (perception) checks, but have advantage on hearing based wisdom (perception) checks. If a creature has the muffle effect, then they cannot hear a creature moving.

While {@condition poisoned} in this way you have disadvantage on death saving throws. You can make another con save at the end of your turn to end the effect of the poison early.

trait.name: Axe Master
entries: The falmer warmonger has proficiency in axes. When hit by a warmonger's axe, you choose for each attack if the warmonger affects your armor resistance or your hit points. If they affect your armor, they roll double the dice. This does not include the poison damage.

trait.name: Commanding Presence
entries: The warmonger has a commanding presence, allowing them to add {@dice 1d4} to attack rolls and saving throws of allies who can hear the target within 30 feet.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the falmer warmonger fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actionHeader: The falmer has 80 stamina and 40 magicka.

action.name: Multi-Attack
entries: The falmer can make 3 weapon attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +10} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +10} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Attack (1 action)
entries: Falmer warmonger makes 1 weapon attack

legendary.name: Move (1 action)
entries: Falmer moves up to their movement speed

legendary.name: Command Ally (1 acttion)
entries: The warmonger targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. if the target can hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Frighten foe (2 actions)
entries: The warmonger targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of warmonger's next turn.

actionHeader: The falmer has 40 stamina and 80 magicka.

action.name: Multi-Attack
entries: The falmer can make two weapon attacks, or cast 2 spell attacks of a single dice damage roll.

action.name: Bound Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) force damage. Can banish daedra to oblivion when hit with bound weapon.

action.name: Frost Bolt (5 magicka)
entries: {@atk rs} 90 feet, {@hit 8} to hit, {@damage 1d10} cold damage to health and stamina.

action.name: Healing Burst (15 magicka)
entries: {@dice 4d8}+wisdom healed within 30 feet.

action.name: Spark Touch (3 magicka)
entries: Melee attack, {@hit 8} to hit, {@damage 1d12} lightning damage on a hit.

action.name: Steadfast Ward (10 magicka)
entries: {@dice 4d10} against magicka for one minute, {@dice 1d4} on saves, goes away if magic damage resistance goes away.

action.name: Ironflesh (10 magicka)
entries: {@damage 10d6} damage resistance against weapons, spell ends early if DR reaches 0. Touch spell

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The ancestor ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Ghostly Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d8 +5}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Ghost Curse {@recharge 5}
entries: Range 10 ft. Target within range must make a wisdom save ({@dc 12}) or take on a ghostly curse. Constitution is reduced by 1, stamina is reduced by 10, and you take {@damage 1d10} necrotic damage on a failed save. The curse can be lifted by a divine ritual that requires 50 gp of material components, performed by a priest of the divine.

monster.name: Dremora Caitiff

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dremora caitiff has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Daedric Immunity
entries: Daedra cannot be affected by illusion spells, unless cast by a mage with a perk that allows it.

actionHeader: The dremora caitiff has 40 stamina and 10 magicka.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: The dremora caitiff can make two greatsword attacks or one war bow attack.

action.name: Daedric Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage and {@damage 1d6} fire damage.

action.name: Daedric Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Second Barrier (5 magicka)
entries: The dremora caitiff regenerates {@dice 3d6} points of armor.

bonus.name: Extra Warbow Attack
entries: The dremora caitiff can make an extra warbow attack as a bonus action if they made a warbow attack as an action.

reaction.name: Parry and Riposte
entries: The dremora can parry and riposte while wielding his greatsword, adding a +4 to his ac if an attack hits, and if the attack misses, he can attack as a reaction, costing 5 stamina if he parries in the same reaction.

monster.name: Daedroth

trait.name: Daedric Immunity
entries: Daedra cannot be affected by illusion spells, unless cast by a mage with a perk that allows it.

entries: The daedroth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shockbloom (5 magicka)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) lightning damage.

action.name: Poisonbloom (5 magicka)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) poison damage.

action.name: Flame Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The daedroth breathes a 15 foot cone of fire from its reptilian snout, dealing {@damage 6d6} fire damage to anyone within the cone who fails a dexterity saving throw ({@dc 14}), or half as much to anyone who succeeds. Targets who fail are lit aflame and take {@damage 1d4} fire damage at the end of their turn unless they use an action to put it out.

bonus.name: Regenerate Health (5 magicka/round)
entries: The daedroth starts a continuous regeneration. Each round they regenerate {@dice 2d6 + 1} health, using a bonus action to maintain the regeneration.

bonus.name: Third Barrier (5 magicka)
entries: The daedroth regenerates {@dice 4d6} points of armor.

action.name: Dark Shortbow

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Corroding Spit {@recharge 5}
entries: Corroding Spit (Recharge 5-6). Ranged weapon attack. 60 ft. {@hit 10} to hit, {@damage 4d6} necrotic damage. The damage doubles if you are wearing armor, and affects armor first.
If your armor is broken, you still take the normal damage, and your weapon is reduced by {@dice 1d4} grades of quality.

action.name: Paralyzing Spit (1/day)
entries: Range 60 ft. Target must make a {@dc 14} constitution saving throw, or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute.

trait.name: Magic Resistance

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.
